title: Poster, "Running Dog", 1969
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, lower right quadrant: Paul Rand '69
description: On off-white ground, imprinted in red, an irregular rectangle, cut off at upper and lower edges, fills most of the sheet.  Within the rectangle, in reserve, a running fox with black stripes, a black coiled tail, black eyes, and a blue nose.  Fox appears to be wearing a yellow wood box, (with horizontal black stripes and down left and right edges of box, black dots).
